summary: Monaco-Ville is the original fortified town of Monaco.
full_text:
Monaco-City  is the southcentral Ward in the Principality of Monaco. Located on a headland that extends into the Mediterranean Sea, Monaco-City is nicknamed The Rock . The name "Monaco-City"  is misleading, Monaco-City is an historical and statistical district, not a city.
^ "United-Nations data, country profile". Retrieved 29 October 2013. 
^ "Constitution of Monaco : The territory of the Principality forms a single commune.". Retrieved 29 October 2013.
title: Monaco-Ville
